name: v0.18.4
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "d3bb833f74b8ad054e6bff5e41606ff10a62880cc99e4d480f4bdfa70add1ba7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.18.4",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.18.4/rules_jest-v0.18.4.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: remove bazeliskrc from e2e by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/129


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.18.2...v0.18.4

name: v0.18.1
body:
⚠️ For `WORKSPACE` users that are pinning `aspect_rules_js`, the rules_jest 0.18.x releases bump the minimum rules_js version required for rules_jest compatibility to [v1.24.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.24.0). `WORKSPACE` users that get rules_js transitively from `rules_jest_dependencies` are not affected. bzlmod users are also not affected since bzlmod ensure the minimum version of rules_js that rules_jest requires is used.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "52dc08fd252add240124ef7ccc46df3a505121758dfb96578a3d5f2ebb4c2b40",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.18.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.18.1/rules_jest-v0.18.1.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: don't add jest-cli and jest-unit if they are already in user provided data by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/120


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

name: v0.18.0
body:
⚠️ For `WORKSPACE` users that are pinning `aspect_rules_js`, this bumps the minimum rules_js version required for rules_jest compatibility to [v1.24.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.24.0). `WORKSPACE` users that get rules_js transitively from `rules_jest_dependencies` are not affected. bzlmod users are also not affected since bzlmod ensure the minimum version of rules_js that rules_jest requires is used.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "e8b2714a27fbafed778c6a53e4294c8cf9ba9ffeca8d81ad76c7981a5f861f70",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.18.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.18.0/rules_jest-v0.18.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: fix typo in docstring by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/118
* chore: bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/113
* perf: use rules_js Bazel 6 optimized fs patches if using Bazel 6 and experimental_allow_unresolved_symlinks is on by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/119


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.17.0...v0.18.0

name: v0.17.0
body:
⚠️ BREAKING CHANGES ⚠️

`jest_repositories` repository rule is removed and a new `node_modules` attribute is now required for `jest_test`. This change is BREAKING for all users.

The `//path/to:node_modules` tree target must be passed to the `jest_test` rules via the `node_modules` attribute. For example,

```
jest_test(
    name = "test",
    node_modules = "//:node_modules",
    ...
)
```

You'll need `jest-cli` and `jest-junit` linked in the node_modules tree provided. The `jest-junit` requirement can be removed by setting `auto_configure_reporters = False` on your `jest_test` targets.

This change has the added benefits of not requiring users to keep the jest version used in their `package.json` in sync with their WORKSPACE and not requiring any changes to `rules_jest` to support new releases of jest.

This change is in the spirit of the change in rules_webpack [v0.11.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.11.0), rules_jasmine [v0.4.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/tag/v0.4.0), rules_rollup [v0.14.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/tag/v0.14.0) and rules_terser [v0.14.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/releases/tag/v0.14.0) so the patterns on the downstream rules_js rulesets we maintain are aligned both for maintainers and for users.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "a2f35eedce1a59f94b2158b056caab09ed66b92cafabd631b25dac78a178e044",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.17.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.17.0/rules_jest-v0.17.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: remove vendored jest versions; user must provider their own jest-cli from their node_modules by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/117


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.16.2...v0.17.0

name: v0.16.2
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "2f62b6356afd2b04a2bd6298e19aaf031b001f79af42c7081b9001d71a9d9602",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.16.2",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.16.2/rules_jest-v0.16.2.tar.gz",
)

####################
# rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

# Fetches the npm packages for jest-cli.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:repositories.bzl", "jest_repositories")

jest_repositories(name = "jest")

load("@jest//:npm_repositories.bzl", jest_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

jest_npm_repositories()

# Register a nodejs toolchain, if you haven't already done so.
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update snapshots hint by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/104
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.27.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/106
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.0-rc0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/108
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/109
* fix: timeout/size shouldn't be passed to js_binary  by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/110
* fix: remove other attributes that don't belong on js_binary by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/111
* chore: update dependencies by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/112
* fix: also pass data to js_binary tool for jest snapshot updates by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/114
* fix: env is valid for js_test, js_binary and js_run_binary by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/115
* test: add test case for #114 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/116


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.16.1...v0.16.2

name: v0.16.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "fa103b278137738ef08fd23d3c8c9157897a7159af2aa22714bc71680da58583",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.16.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.16.1/rules_jest-v0.16.1.tar.gz",
)

####################
# rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

# Fetches the npm packages for jest-cli.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:repositories.bzl", "jest_repositories")

jest_repositories(name = "jest")

load("@jest//:npm_repositories.bzl", jest_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

jest_npm_repositories()

# Register a nodejs toolchain, if you haven't already done so.
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: auto-detect multiple snapshots when snapshots is True by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/103


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.1

## What's Changed
* chore: Add the macOS runner to the matrix strategy by @realtimetodie in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/94
* release: publish release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/99
* chore: update to rules_js 1.19.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/101
* feat: add support for updating multiple __snapshots__ directories from a single coarse grained jest_test target by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/102

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.15.0...v0.16.0

## What's Changed
* Fixes #89 Added support for setting the chdir attr by @twheys in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/91
* test: add test with jest config in parent directory by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/88
* fix: support jest_test(config) dependencies, add esm tests by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/83
* feat: vendor package.json files per version for rules_js v1.17.0 support by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/97
* chore: update to rules_js 1.17.0 and aspect_bazel_lib 1.24.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/98

## New Contributors
* @twheys made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/91

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.14.4...v0.15.0

name: v0.14.3
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "abb6bed8b7b22df20d652c60d780cc23e65ffe6c56500d5a9a836a69469f7f99",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.14.3",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/archive/refs/tags/v0.14.3.tar.gz",
)

####################
# rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

# Fetches the npm packages for jest-cli.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:repositories.bzl", "jest_repositories")

jest_repositories(name = "jest")

load("@jest//:npm_repositories.bzl", jest_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

jest_npm_repositories()

# Register a nodejs toolchain, if you haven't already done so.
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```

## What's Changed
* feat: add snapshot support with write_source_files snapshot update target by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/62
* chore: add jest versions v28.1.1 through v29.3.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/67
* chore: add examples of using esm with jest_test both .mjs files and with 'type':'module' in package.json by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/66
* chore: use Aspect CLI 5.0.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/74
* feat: add support for updating __snapshots__ directories from output directory artifacts by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/73
* chore: update to rules_js 1.10.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/75
* chore: update to rules_js 1.11.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/76


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.12.1...v0.13.0

## What's Changed
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/38
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/37
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/39
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/40
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.11.8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/41
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/43
* chore(deps): update build_bazel_integration_testing digest to 7d3e9ae by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/27
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_rules_js to v1.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/45
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/44
* chore: update to  aspect_bazel_lib 1.12.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/48
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_rules_js to v1.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/49
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/46
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.27.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/42
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/28
* feat: support rules_js 1.6.5 with improved version mirroring by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/51


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.10.0...v0.11.0

name: v0.10.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "bb3226707f9872185865a6381eb3a19311ca7b46e8ed475aad50975906a6cb6a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.10.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/archive/refs/tags/v0.10.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

# Fetches the npm packages for jest-cli.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "jest_repositories")

jest_repositories(
    name = "jest",
    jest_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)

# Register a nodejs toolchain, if you haven't already done so.
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```

[rules_js 1.1.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.1.0) is required for this release.

## What's Changed
* fix: use unique npm_import namespace for vendored npm dependencies of rules_jest by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/26
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/16
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/14
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/13
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/29
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/31
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/32
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.26.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/30
* chore: update to rules_js 1.0.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/33
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/35
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/36


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0

name: v0.9.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "fb2f4b9ae8f79fab05062e952fd826458d24ac23a53f2c64a7c0f538345342de",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/archive/refs/tags/v0.9.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

# Fetches the npm packages for jest-cli.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "jest_repositories")

jest_repositories(
    name = "jest",
    jest_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)

# Register a nodejs toolchain, if you haven't already done so.
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib_1.9.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/23
* refactor: update to rules_js 1.0.0-rc.4 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/24


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0
